title: Ermahgerd, an ersome hert
text: You guys need to get this hat! I'm a petite adult female (lol that makes me sound like some breed of dog) and I have kind of a small head. All the adult sized hats sized small are still too large in circumference. So here is a pic of me in the hat so you can see what it looks like. I was in an Athleta fashion show, lol. I am really not made for the runway. I tried to do a little pirouette thingy and my shoes with their rubber bottoms kinda got stuck as I spun around and it looked super awkward. Anyway, I digress. The hat. The quality is good for a "made in China" item, the inner brim is not at all itchy. It's not the most ventilatory thing to wear in 190 million percent humidity, but as my mother always said, pain is the price for beauty. I also purchased the hat in another color. You really can't go wrong with this accessory! So buy it now!! :-)

title: This hat is very nice and well made
text: I have a small head for an adult, so i need to buy kids hats. This hat is very nice and well made.  But it was still a bit loose on my head, which was hard to believe (I must have a really small noggin).  I didn't want to return it because it was exactly what I wanted, so I sewed a black fabric headband to the existing black band inside and it now fits perfect!  I am actually thinking of getting another color.  Just have to go buy another headband. :)

It came in quicker than anticipated, was in a box that managed to not be crushed (yeah!) and was better than I had thought I would get for a $10 investment. It was surprisingly structured and looked just like the picture. I'm tempted to get it in different colors now that I know how great it is, may even need to look for the adult version!!!

title: Decent purchase.
text: Works great as a costume/show hat. It was purchased for my 6 yr old who has a ton of hair and it fit great.

title: Great for adults too!
text: I'm a woman with a pretty small head (21" around), and I wanted a hat like this for a vacation but every one I purchased was too big. This one fit the bill! It fit very well around, depth was good, and the brim wasn't too wide. It doesn't feel particularly sturdy, but good enough to hold up for awhile.

title: Only for older children with really big heads.
text: I’m very conflicted on how many stars to give this. First of all, if you are looking for a nice hat for a 2 year old, toddler or younger child DON’T buy this one. The hat itself seems to be great quality, it was shipped in a box which I greatly appreciated. Very cute even better in person than pictured. BUT all that didn’t matter because it was WAY too big for my 2 1/2 year old (with an above average head size) It fit me great.. but I’m a 25 year old grown woman. We ordered this for a wedding out of state and unfortunately by the time it came it was too late to order a different one. Very disappointing. Also to top things off I’m being charged almost $4 to return it.

title: Ship in a Box pls!
text: Great hat fits just right BUT when it is shipped in a mailer vs a box it is crushed when it arrived. My other hat from the same company was shipped in a box so makes no sense.

It is slightly big, but still looks really cute. I WILL be buying it in other colors and cant wait to pair it with all sorts of summer stuff. Already my new favorite hat!

title: great price. My son is 8 years old and ...
text: Cute hat, great price. My son is 8 years old and average size and it's way too big for him.

title: Nice summer hat.
text:
I purchased this so-called "kids" hat because I am an adult with a small hat size - 6 5/8 and can tell you it will not fit children. I had to buy hat sizer (actually, I got window insulation) for the inner band in order to make it fit me. So, caveat emptor.

What about the hat itself? It's a paper straw hat and perfect for hot, summer days. I chose the white with black band version. The material is rigid enough and there's little "give" in the hat - as it should be with this type construction. It's a trilby which means it's similar to a fedora but it has a smaller than usual brim and taller crown. It has a pinch, or set of indentations, in front.

It wears well for the summer. As I am bald now, I wear a hat to shield the skin of my head from the sun. This hat is very light and cool with lots of ventilation. For the price, it's a very good hat, but keep it away from moisture or it will degrade as it's made of essentially paper. So a good summer hat for the price, but larger than you'd expect for a "kids hat".
